title: STEM+C Learning Design via Smart Greenhouse Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental STEM literacy and foundational computing knowledge
context.additional_context: Designed to spark interest in STEM+C fields through real-life connected projects for university students. Team-based collaborative learning conducted in hybrid (online/offline) environments

learning_goals: Students can design a smart greenhouse prototype using IoT sensors and programming tools to solve real-world environmental issues
Learners systematically perform problem-definition, problem-solving, and evaluation phases in project-based collaborative processes
Participants enhance their ability to integrate computational thinking (data analysis, algorithm design) with STEM domain knowledge
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
